item.title: From 'Sluggish' to Supreme: My Journey to 100% Linux
item.description:
From “Sluggish” to Supreme: My Journey to 100% Linux

We all have that one moment that changes how we see technology. For me, it happened by accident during my school practice at an electrotechnical high school. While some of my peers were heading to big public firms like Telekom, I ended up at a small, private PC service shop. Thatâ€™s where I saw it: a system that looked “weird,” fast, and undeniably cool.
